General.Name: Dongwoon Anatech Co Ltd
General.Description: Dongwoon Anatech Co., Ltd. operates as an analog semiconductor company in South Korea and internationally. It offers auto focus driver ICs for mobile cameras; various ICs for mobile BLU, power management, LED flashes, charging batteries, etc.; various linear, DC/DC, PFC ICs, etc. for LED lighting products; finger print modules for digital door lock, locker, safe, and furniture applications; and HD haptic driver ICs for smart phones and tablet PCs. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
